long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension to store and find reference text for prompts. A library for writing styles.

Here you can safe your own writing style or the style from someone else. U can use and modify the reference text and acces is easily to use in every prompt.

A few writestyle ideas:
- Shakespeare
-My informal style email to a collegue
-My informal style email to a colleague when angry
- A formal writing style for contract and legal purposes
- The writing style of local columt writer
- The writing style similar to the GoPro branding.

Copy the reference text and use it to output the message you want in any style you want.
